entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text:
@WhiteHouse And you are pushing the States to re-open without meeting the criteria set out by the Coronavirus taskforce as preconditions. 

China owns the origin but TRUMP owns the scale and impact of the epidemic in the US.
